fine.description: These are the minimum requirements for joining veteran trials. The gear sets, skills, and damage are needed to be a contributing member of a coordinated trial group.
fine.howToApply: Please use the [ðŸ“©ï½œapply-for-ranks](https://discord.com/channels/694306288250781699/774505827113107466/802968528017162273) channel to open a request. This will create a new channel for your submit your screenshots for our Officers and Raid Leaders to review.

2.setRequirements: Pair w/ Spell Power Cure or Olorime

superior.description:
These sets, skills, and damage requirements allow for more group optimization than fine sets, but also require more understanding of how and when to perform certain actions to cause the gear to activate.

All <@&721310651137654834> ranks must first meet the requirements of <@&721310503015546951> for the same role.
superior.howToApply: Please use the [ðŸ“©ï½œapply-for-ranks](https://discord.com/channels/694306288250781699/774505827113107466/802968528017162273) channel to open a request. This will create a new channel for your submit your screenshots for our Officers and Raid Leaders to review.
superior.TrialCompletions:
Must have clears on a minimum of 3 of the following veteran trials:

- vMOL
- vHoF
- vAS
- vCR
- vSS
- vKA
- vRG

Logs are not required for <@&721310651137654834>. Please post screenshots of your achievements to show these clears. If you have already posted them in <#728742997667217559>, you do not have to post them again.

epic.description:
These are additional sets that start allowing groups to optimize in more situations, including large trash pulls between bosses.

All <@&721310549547417671> ranks must first meet the requirements of <@&721310651137654834> for the same role.
epic.howToApply: Please use the [ðŸ“©ï½œapply-for-ranks](https://discord.com/channels/694306288250781699/774505827113107466/802968528017162273) channel to open a request. This will create a new channel for your submit your screenshots and logs for our Officers and Raid Leaders to review.
epic.TrialCompletions:
Must have clears on all veteran DLC trials and a minimum of 3 of the following hard mode trials:

- vMOL HM
- vHoF HM
- vAS HM
- vCR HM
- vSS HM
- vKA HM
- vRG HM

Logs are not required for <@&721310549547417671>. Please post screenshots of your achievements to show these clears. If you have already posted them in <#728742997667217559>, you do not have to post them again.

legendary.description:
By <@&721310768859054130>, it is expected that someone knows their role and class very well and will voluntarily obtain any additional sets that will benefit them in even the most niche situations. At this level, we are looking for mastery of your character, and awareness in trials.

All <@&721310768859054130> ranks must first meet the requirements of <@&721310549547417671> for the same role.
legendary.howToApply: Please use the [ðŸ“©ï½œapply-for-ranks](https://discord.com/channels/694306288250781699/774505827113107466/802968528017162273) channel to open a request. This will create a new channel for your submit your screenshots and logs for our Officers and Raid Leaders to review.
legendary.TrialCompletions: Must have clears on all hard mode DLC trials (excluding vRG for now)

TrialPerformanceReview.details:
When applying for <@&721310768859054130> roles, you will be expected to provide trial logs to be reviewed by the guild officers. These logs will be used to determine several factors that cannot be determined by a dummy parse or gear alone. Acceptable trials for log sumbissions include:

- vMOL HM
- vHOF HM
- vAS HM
- vCR HM
- vSS HM
- vKA HM
- vRG HM

Below are the criteria we're looking at for each role.
TrialPerformanceReview.ddReview:
TRIAL Single Target Damage
Survivability
Extra Duties (Backyard Runner, Portals, etc.)
TrialPerformanceReview.healerReview:
Survivability
Combat Prayer Uptime
Major Courage Uptime
Class Specific Buffs/Debuffs
Gear Set Usage/Uptime
TrialPerformanceReview.tankReview:
Survivability
Fracture Uptime
Maim Uptime
Crusher Uptime
Class Specific Buffs/Debuffs
